definitions.definition: To force oneself (in a particular direction ).
definitions.label_groups: intransitive , often with into or through

definitions.definition: To chase (a steer ) on horseback and wrestle it to the ground by twisting its horns (as a rodeo performance ).

main_definition: ( intransitive , often with into or through ) To force oneself (in a particular direction ).
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To chase (a steer ) on horseback and wrestle it to the ground by twisting its horns (as a rodeo performance ).
